name: Copperkill Slime
description: The Copperkill Slime is a Huge, greenish ooze that can blend seamlessly with its environment when motionless. It lacks advanced thought and is entirely focused on its predatory instincts.
memorable: It can immobilize opponents while dealing ongoing poison damage and has the ability to adapt its position strategically on the battlefield.
goals: To ambush unsuspecting adventurers and immobilize them using its toxic capabilities.
relations: It may be encountered in areas with other oozes or creatures that thrive in toxic environments.
environment: Typically found in subterranean locations or areas with abundant organic decay.
strengths: Immune to acid and poison damage, resistant to piercing and slashing attacks, and possesses high durability with 142 hit points.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to non-piercing or non-slashing damage types, lacks any tactical thinking abilities.
attacks: Can perform multiple attacks with pseudopods, dealing bludgeoning damage and ongoing poison damage to grappled foes.
most_powerful_ability: Poisonous Snap, which sprays poison in a 10-foot radius, coating nearby creatures in toxic slime.
senses: Has blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to perceive its surroundings without relying on sight.
skills: Lacks significant skills but has a passive perception of 9, which is considered low.
additional_information: Can move through tight spaces easily due to its Amorphous ability.
Able to stretch its body across surfaces to camouflage itself.
Does not require sleep, remaining a constant threat.
Automatically grapples targets it successfully hits with two pseudopods.
Can traverse difficult surfaces and ceilings without needing checks.
test_queries: dangerous slime that clings to surfaces
